name: Volunteers of America Southeast Louisiana, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Volunteers of America Southeast Louisiana, Inc. is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in New Orleans, LA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $18.6M in Medicaid payments across 145K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $18.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
